rows.translation: I swear by the sun and its brilliance,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.translation: And the moon when it follows the sun,
And the day when it shows it,
And the night when it draws a veil over it,
And the heaven and Him Who made it,
And the earth and Him Who extended it,
And the soul and Him Who made it perfect,
Then He inspired it to understand what is right and wrong for it;
He will indeed be successful who purifies it,
And he will indeed fail who corrupts it.
Samood gave the lie (to the truth) in their inordinacy,
When the most unfortunate of them broke forth with

rows.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا
rows.translation: So Allah's apostle said to them (Leave alone) Allah's she-camel, and (give) her (to) drink.

rows.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
rows.translation: But they called him a liar and slaughtered her, therefore their Lord crushed them for their sin and levelled them (with the ground).
rows.transliteration: fakadhhabūhu fa`aqarūhā fadamdama `alayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwāhā

rows.translation: And He fears not its consequence.
